channel.title: DevFreeBooks
channel.description: A collection of free books for developers

item.title: Book: Speaking JavaScript: An In-Depth Guide for Programmers
item.description: Speaking JavaScript helps you approach the language with four standalone sections. First, a quick-start guide teaches you just enough of the language to help you be productive right away. More experienced JavaScript programmers will find a complete and easy-to-read reference that covers each language feature in depth.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Clojure for the brave and true
item.description: Complete, entertaining introduction to Clojure.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: The Type Astronaut’s Guide to Shapeless
item.description: This book is a guide to using shapeless¹, a library for generic programming in Scala.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Stuff Goes Bad: Erlang in Anger
item.description: This book intends to be a little guide about how to be the Erlang medic in a time of war. It is first and foremost a collection of tips and tricks to help understand where failures come from, and a dictionary of different code snippets and practices that helped developers debug production systems that were built in Erlang.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: High Performance Browser Networking
item.description: You’ll then dive into performance characteristics of technologies such as HTTP 2.0, client-side network scripting with XHR, real-time streaming with SSE and WebSocket, and P2P communication with WebRTC.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: The OCaml System: Documentation and User's Manual
item.description: This the official User's Manual. It serves as a complete reference guide to OCaml. Updated for each version of OCaml, it contains the description of the language, of its extensions, and the documentation of the tools and libraries included in the official distribution.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Real World OCaml
item.description: This hands-on book shows you how to take advantage of OCaml’s functional, imperative, and object-oriented programming styles with recipes for many real-world tasks.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Unix System Programming in OCaml
item.description: This is an excellent book on Unix system programming, with an emphasis on communications between processes. The main novelty of this work is the use of OCaml, instead of the C language that is customary in systems programming. This gives an unusual perspective on systems programming and on OCaml.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Using, Understanding, and Unraveling OCaml
item.description: This book describes both the OCaml language and the theoretical grounds behind its powerful type system.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Exploring ES6
item.description: An in-depth book on ECMAScript 6, for JavaScript programmers.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Ruby Web Dev: The Other Way
item.description: This guide is an attempt to describe the way to build the web app with a real understanding of each component, with knowledge that is relevant in any web language and framework. To become a better web developer and demand for a better ecosystem!
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: JavaScript Allongé, the "Six" Edition
item.description: A long pull of functions, combinators, & decorators, updated to include the latest ES-6 features.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Mostly Adequate Guide to Functional Programming
item.description: Learn the functional programming paradigm using the world's most popular functional programming language: JavaScript.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Pro Git
item.description: Pro Git is your fully-updated guide to Git and its usage in the modern world. Git has come a long way since it was first developed by Linus Torvalds for Linux kernel development. This book teaches you how to use it like a pro.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Threading in C#
item.description: An extensive article on multithreading in C#. This tackles difficult issues such as thread safety, when to use Abort, Wait Handles vs Wait and Pulse, the implications of Apartment Threading in Windows Forms, using Thread Pooling, Synchronization Contexts, Memory Barriers and non-blocking synchronization constructs.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Learn You Some Erlang for Great Good!
item.description: Erlang is the language of choice for programmers who want to write robust, concurrent applications, but its strange syntax and functional design can intimidate the uninitiated. Luckily, there’s a new weapon in the battle against Erlang-phobia: Learn You Some Erlang for Great Good!
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Web2Py
item.description: Web2py is an open source python web development framework.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Higher-Order Perl
item.description: Higher-Order Perl is about functional programming techniques in Perl. It's about how to write functions that can modify and manufacture other functions.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Pocket Guide to Writing SVG
item.description: A pocket guide to writing SVG.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: SCALABLE, un libro sobre SVG
item.description: A lo largo de 15 capítulos, 120 páginas y más de 70 ejemplos vamos a ver todo lo que podemos hacer con SVG.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Build Pacman
item.description: Learn Modern Javascript, HTML5 Canvas, and a bit of Ember.js. This is a book about surviving an alien invasion and using web technologies.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: HTML5 for Web Designers
item.description: HTML5 isn’t as confusing as it once was, but it still isn’t straightforward. It’s an evolutionary, rather than revolutionary, change in the ongoing story of markup—and if you’re currently creating websites with any version of HTML, you’re already using HTML5.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: React.js Succinctly
item.description: In React.js Succinctly, author Samer Buna introduces the novel approach to building user interfaces that React provides, and walks readers through the basics of declarative user interfaces, React components, working with user input, and more.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Vim para Noobs
item.description: A free GitBook about Vim editor for Noobs become text hackers.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Swift Essentials - DZone Refcard
item.description: Get ahead of the fastest growing programming language. Swift is an open source, type-safe, object-oriented programming language that is used for more than client-side mobile apps. It is designed for developers to have an easier time writing and maintaining accurate code.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Getting Started With Git - DZone Refcard
item.description: This updated Refcard explains why so many developers are migrating to this exciting platform. Learn about creating a new Git repository, cloning existing projects, the remote workflow, and more to pave the way for limitless content version control.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Core Java - DZone Refcard
item.description: This free, 6-page cheat sheet gives you an overview of key aspects of the Java language and references on the core library, commonly used tools, and new Java 8 features.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Automate Boring Stuff With Python
item.description: In Automate the Boring Stuff with Python, you'll learn how to use Python to write programs that do in minutes what would take you hours to do by hand no prior programming experience required.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Getting Started with Scala - DZone Refcard
item.description: This 6 page cheat sheet covers creating a new Scala project, a tour of Scala's features, an introduction to classes and objects within Scala, and much more.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Go Bootcamp
item.description: Everything you need to know to get started with Go.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: You Don't Know JS: Scope & Closures
item.description: Like other books in the "You Don’t Know JS" series, Scope and Closures dives into trickier parts of the language that many JavaScript programmers simply avoid. Armed with this knowledge, you can achieve true JavaScript mastery.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: C# Succinctly
item.description: C# is a general purpose, object-oriented, component-based programming language. As a general purpose language, there are a number of ways to apply C# to accomplish many different tasks. With C# Succinctly by Joe Mayo, you will quickly learn the syntax you need to build your own C# applications.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: C# School
item.description: 14 lessons to get you started with C# and .NET
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: OOP in C# Succinctly
item.description: Object-Oriented Programming in C# Succinctly provides an introduction to OOP for C# developers. Author Sander Rossel provides overviews and numerous samples to guide readers towards OOP mastery.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: You Don't Know JS: ES6 & Beyond
item.description: Like other books in this series, You Don’t Know JS: Async & Performance dives into trickier parts of the language that many JavaScript programmers simply avoid. Armed with this knowledge, you can become a true JavaScript master.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: You Don't Know JS: Async & Performance
item.description: Like other books in this series, You Don’t Know JS: Async & Performance dives into trickier parts of the language that many JavaScript programmers simply avoid. Armed with this knowledge, you can become a true JavaScript master.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: You Don't Know JS: Types & Grammar
item.description: Like other books in this series, You Don’t Know JS: Types & Grammar dives into trickier parts of the language that many JavaScript programmers simply avoid or assume don’t exist (like types). Armed with this knowledge, you can achieve true JavaScript mastery.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: You Don't Know JS: this & Object Prototypes
item.description: Like other books in the “You Don’t Know JS” series, this and Object Prototypes dives into trickier parts of the language that many JavaScript programmers simply avoid. Armed with this knowledge, you can become a true JavaScript master.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Modern Perl
item.description: Modern Perl teaches you how Perl really works. It's the only book that explains Perl thoroughly, from its philosophical roots to the pragmatic decisions that help you solve real problems—and keep them solved.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Learn You a Haskell for Great Good
item.description: This is Learn You a Haskell, the funkiest way to learn Haskell, which is the best functional programming language around. You may have heard of it. This guide is meant for people who have programmed already, but have yet to try functional programming.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: You Don't Know JS: Up & Going
item.description: The series’ first book, Up & Going, provides the necessary background for those of you with limited programming experience. By learning the basic building blocks of programming, as well as JavaScript’s core mechanisms, you’ll be prepared to dive into the other, more in-depth books in the series—and be well on your way toward true JavaScript.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: ECMAScript 6 Succinctly
item.description: ECMAScript 6 (ES6), also known as ECMAScript 2015, brings new functionality and features to the table that developers have been wanting for a long time. The wait is over, and with help from ECMAScript 6 Succinctly by Matthew Duffield.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: C# Code Contracts Succinctly
item.description: In C# Code Contracts Succinctly, author Dirk Strauss demonstrates how to use Code Contracts to validate logical correctness in code, how they can be integrated with abstract classes and interfaces, and even how they can be used to make writing documentation less painful.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Elixir School
item.description: Lessons about the Elixir programming language.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Perl 6 Introduction
item.description: Perl 6 Introduction is intended to give you a quick overview of the Perl 6 programming language. For those who are new to Perl 6 it should get you up and running.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: The Hitchhiker’s Guide to Python
item.description: This handcrafted guide exists to provide both novice and expert Python developers a best practice handbook to the installation, configuration, and usage of Python on a daily basis.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Effective Django
item.description: Effective Django development means building applications that are testable, maintainable, and scalable – not only in terms of traffic or load, but in terms of being able to add developers to projects.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Vim for Humans
item.description: A good introduction to the Vim editor
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Getting Started with Meteor Deployment
item.description: Getting Started with Meteor Deployment is a free, online book about the Meteor JavaScript framework that explains everything you need to know about deploying your applications to the web.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Your Second Meteor Application
item.description: Your Second Meteor Application is a free, online book about the Meteor JavaScript framework that helps beginning web developers build a complete to-do list application with the Meteor JavaScript framework.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Learn Vimscript the Hard Way
item.description: Learn Vimscript the Hard Way is a book for users of the Vim editor who want to learn how to customize Vim.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Go by Example
item.description: Go by Example is a hands-on introduction to Go using annotated example programs.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Deep Dive in TypeScript
item.description: The definitive guide to TypeScript. Dive into all the details that a JavaScript developer needs to know to be a great TypeScript developer.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Ruby On Rails Tutorial 3rd Edition
item.description: Learn Web Development with Rails
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Learn Programming with Java
item.description: Online Tutorial and Challenges to learn the basics of Java programming.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Learning Go
item.description: Book for people who already know some programming languages and how to program.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Ember Tutorial
item.description: This tutorial provides an introduction to the Ember.js framework. It shows you how to build an Ember.js app with a Ruby on Rails backend while explaining all the underlying concepts along the way.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Backbone Tutorials
item.description: This book aims to get developers up to speed with single page web application development using Backbone.js as a foundation.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Developing Backbone.js Applications
item.description: The goal of this book is to create an authoritative and centralized repository of information that can help those developing real-world apps with Backbone.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Haskell language
item.description: In this book we aim to introduce you both to the Haskell language, from the very basics to advanced features, and to computer programming in general. We urge seasoned programmers to be especially patient with this process.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Sinatra Book
item.description: This is a quick recipe book about how to create a Sinatra's project and deploy it into Heroku's platform.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Meteor Tutorial
item.description: Bring your ideas to life with Meteor.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Practical Cryptography With Go
item.description: This is an introduction to cryptography for developers. It assumes that you aren't looking for cryptographic theories, but practical ways to use cryptography in your projects. It covers the basic standard building blocks, and includes some sample code to help you get started.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Play Framework Recipes
item.description: This ebook covers Play Framework 2.x using Scala language.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Agile Android Software Development
item.description: This book teaches you how to turn your ideas into successful apps that everyone will talk about, love, and share. With Agile tools and techniques, any developer can get a chunk of the Android pie!
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: HTTP Succinctly
item.description: With HTTP Succinctly, you’ll learn all about something you use on a daily basis.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Android Programming Succinctly
item.description: Navigate the key requirements for designing an Android application with Android Programming Succinctly as your guide.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Better Specs
item.description: Better Specs tries to fill this gap by collecting most of the 'best practices' that other developers learn through years of experience.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: APIs on Rails
item.description: The best way to build a REST API using Rails
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Angular Basics
item.description: A free interactive book, covering directives, modules, services, controllers, routing, and more.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Parallel and Concurrent Programming in Haskell
item.description: The main goal of the book is to get you programming competently with Parallel and Concurrent Haskell. However, as you probably know by now, learning about programming is not something you can do by reading a book alone.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Real World Haskell
item.description: Throughout this book, we will show you how Haskell's alternatives to the features of traditional languages are powerful, flexible, and lead to reliable code. Haskell is positively crammed full of cutting edge ideas about how to create great software.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: HTTP2 Explained
item.description: The book HTTP2 Explained describes the protocol HTTP/2 at a technical and protocol level. Background, the protocol, the implementations and the future.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Build web application with Golang
item.description: This book is for those of you who are working with PHP/Python/Ruby, you will learn how to build a web application with Go and it's for those of you who are working with C/C++, you will know how the web works.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: A byte of Vim
item.description: This is a book which aims to help you to learn how to use the Vim editor (version 7), even if all you know is how to use the computer keyboard.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: A byte of Python
item.description: This is a free book on programming using the Python language. It serves as a tutorial or guide to the Python language for a beginner audience. If all you know about computers is how to save text files, then this is the book for you.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Scala by Example
item.description: This book instructs you in Python by slowly building and establishing skills through techniques like practice and memorization, then applying them to increasingly difficult problems. By the end of the book you will have the tools needed to begin learning more complex programming topics.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Creative Scala
item.description: Creative Scala is aimed at developers who have no prior experience in Scala. It is designed to give you a fun introduction to functional programming. We assume you have some familiarity with another programming language but little or no experience with Scala or other functional languages.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Programming JavaScript Applications
item.description: Take advantage of JavaScript’s power to build robust web-scale or enterprise applications that are easy to extend and maintain. By applying the design patterns outlined in this practical book, experienced JavaScript developers will learn how to write flexible and resilient code that’s easier—yes, easier—to work with as your code base grows.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Explore Flask
item.description: Explore Flask is a book about best practices and patterns for developing web applications with Flask.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Building a JavaScript Framework
item.description: This book is a guide to building a JavaScript framework. It’ll teach you how to build a framework and draw on real-world code from projects like jQuery.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Eloquent JavaScript (Second Edition)
item.description: This is a book about JavaScript, programming, and the wonders of the digital.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Getting Started with Django
item.description: This series is meant to take you from novice to competent. What do I mean by novice? You’ve done the Django tutorial, you understand the basics of Python, but you have little-to-no idea about how to go forward from here without making a ton of mistakes.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Gradle Goodness Notebook
item.description: Learn more about Gradle features with code snippets and short articles. The articles and code will get you started quickly and will give more insight in Gradle.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Kestrels, Quirky Birds, and Hopeless Egocentricity
item.description: Raganwald's collected adventures in Combinatory Logic and Ruby Meta-Programming.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: CoffeeScript Ristretto
item.description: CoffeeScript Ristretto is a book about programming with functions that uses the CoffeeScript programming language for the examples and exercises.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: JavaScript Spessore
item.description: JavaScript Spessore will show you how to build JavaScript programs that scale in code, in time, and across a team, using the one technique that has passed the test of time: Objects and metaobjects that have a single responsibility, are decoupled from each other, and can be composed freely.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Spocklight Notebook
item.description: Learn more about the Spock framework features with code snippets and short articles. The articles and code will get you started quickly and will give more insight in Spock.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: iOS Succinctly
item.description: The companion to Objective-C Succinctly, and your practical introduction to developing for iOS.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: jQuery Succinctly
item.description: jQuery Succinctly was written to express, in short-order, the concepts essential to intermediate and advanced jQuery development.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Typescript Succinctly
item.description: Jump into Microsoft's open-source superset of JavaScript with TypeScript Succinctly.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: PHP The Right Way
item.description: PHP: The Right Way is an easy-to-read, quick reference for PHP popular coding standards, links to authoritative tutorials around the Web and what the contributors consider to be best practices at the present time.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Developing Games with Ruby
item.description: At day you have to wrangle with legacy code, fix bugs, struggle with APIs, deploy services and integrate things. Yet you wish you could create worlds, animate dragons, break laws of physics and design artificial intelligence. You can.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Learn Ruby The Hard Way
item.description: This book instructs you in Ruby by slowly building and establishing skills through techniques like practice and memorization, then applying them to increasingly difficult problems. By the end of the book you will have the tools needed to begin learning more complex programming topics.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Git Succinctly
item.description: With Git Succinctly by Ryan Hodson, you can get up and running with one of the fastest-spreading revision control systems out there.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Knockout.js Succinctly
item.description: The Knockout JavaScript library is an invaluable tool for building dynamic, data-bound web UIs with minimal code.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Swift Cheat Sheet
item.description: A short guide to using Apple's new programming language, Swift.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Django Girls Tutorial
item.description: This book is a Django tutorial created for DjangoGirls event.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: HTML 5 Shoot 'em Up in an Afternoon
item.description: Learn the basics of Game Programming with this free Phaser tutorial.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Laravel 4 Official Documentation
item.description: Synced daily. A free ebook version of the Laravel 4.2 Official Documentation.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Learn Javascript
item.description: This book will teach you the basics of programming and Javascript.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: RubyKin
item.description: Teach kids to code, with Ruby!
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: D3 Tips and Tricks
item.description: Interactive Data Visualization in a Web Browser.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Web Development Using Elixir
item.description: Are you interested in web development? Seen Erlang and Elixir around and want to know what the fuss is about? Well, read along to learn how to apply Elixir for use in web development!
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Git for Everyone
item.description: Unless you have been living in a cave, Git is everywhere. Creative or engineering, you have directly encountered or will encounter Git in the workplace. A common misconception as well is that Git is only for teams? Regardless of work style or team size, Git is the tool that everyone should be using.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Module Patterns
item.description: The first short book of this series is a short introduction that sets the foundation of the next books to come. It shows what you can do with JavaScript and the Node module system to create and consume different types of modules: Singletons, Closure-based and prototype-based pseudo-classes, façades and others.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: iOS 8 Day by Day
item.description: A review of all the important part of iOS 8 for developers. Presented in 39 easy to digest chunks, each with a sample project.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Java for Web Developing
item.description: This is a free ebook which shows the main concepts about web developing system using JavaEE.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: The Java® Language Specification Java SE 8 Edition
item.description: Written by the inventors of the Java Language Specification. This book provides complete and detailed coverage of the Java 8 programming language.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: The Java® Virtual Machine Specification Java SE 8 Edition
item.description: Written by the inventors of the Java Virtual Machine Specification. This book provides complete and detailed coverage of the Java Virtual Machine 8.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Java and Object Oriented
item.description: This is a free ebook which shows the main concepts about Object Oriented Programming using Java language.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Java Tests, JSF and Design Patterns
item.description: This is a free ebook which shows useful frameworks for testing, JSF for Java Web and the principles about Design Patterns for Java.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Algorithms and Data Structures with Java
item.description: This is a free ebook which shows the main algorithms and data structures examples using Java language.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Python Practice Book
item.description: This book is prepared from the training notes of Anand Chitipothu.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Learn Python The Hard Way
item.description: This book instructs you in Python by slowly building and establishing skills through techniques like practice and memorization, then applying them to increasingly difficult problems. By the end of the book you will have the tools needed to begin learning more complex programming topics.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Your First Meteor Application
item.description: Meteor is a fascinating framework that is great for beginning developers who have never built a web application before. We’ll cover a lot of ground over the next few hours, walking through a gentle but broad introduction to what might possibly be the best way to build an application for the web.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Pro Meteor: Meteor Internals, Scaling & More
item.description: Pro Meteor helps you to understand Meteor Internals, Scaling & Many Other Topics.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Let's create a realtime blackboard with Meteor Streams
item.description: This is a free ebook guiding you to build a realtime blackboard using Meteor Streams. Meteor Streams is a Meteor Smart Packages which adds messaging based realtime capabilities to Meteor. It allows you to build realtime apps without using MongoDB.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: JavaScript Succinctly
item.description: If you are a designer or developer who has only used JavaScript under the mantle of libraries (such as jQuery, Prototype, etc.), it is my hope that the material in this book will transform you from a JavaScript library user into a JavaScript developer.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: ECMAScript Language Specification
item.description: Learn all about the Javacript language specifications with this official ECMA-262 bible.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Learning JavaScript Design Patterns
item.description: In this book we will explore applying both classical and modern design patterns to the JavaScript programming language.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Patterns For Large-Scale JavaScript Application architecture
item.description: In this book we're going to discuss an effective set of patterns for large-scale JavaScript application architecture.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Writing Modular JavaScript With AMD, CommonJS & ES Harmony
item.description: In this article, we're going to look at three formats for writing modular JavaScript: AMD, CommonJS and proposals for the next version of JavaScript, Harmony.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Understanding ECMAScript 6
item.description: This book is intended as a guide for those who are already familiar with JavaScript and ECMAScript 5. While a deep understanding of the language isn’t necessary to use this book, it is helpful in understanding the differences between ECMAScript 5 and 6.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Human JavaScript
item.description: This is a book about a specific set of tools, patterns, and approaches that we feel are optimized for people. These approaches enable our team to quickly build and deliver high-quality JavaScript applications for humans.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: An Introduction to Programming in Go
item.description: Computer programming is the art, craft and science of writing programs which define how computers operate. This book will teach you how to write computer programs using a programming language designed by Google named Go.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: The Little Go Book
item.description: The Little Go Book is a free introduction to Google's Go programming language. It's aimed at developers who might not be quite comfortable with the idea of pointers and static typing. It's longer than the other Little books, but hopefully still captures that little feeling.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Building web apps with Go
item.description: Learn how to build and deploy web applications with Go.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: npm recipes
item.description: There are over 70,000 modules on npm, so there's a wildly big number of opportunities for checking out how various npm modules can work together. This book showcases them one 'recipe' at a time.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Node, Express and libsass: project from scratch workshop
item.description: Node.js What's all the buzz about? Follow along in this workshop/tutorial to get your head wrapped around what it takes to make a Node project from scratch.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Recipes with Angular.js
item.description: Practical concepts and techniques for rapid web application development.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Practical AngularJS
item.description: Real-world examples of using AngularJS in multiple scenarios and platforms (KarmaJS, Firebase, Eclipse, WebStorm, O2 Platform)
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Mixu's Node book
item.description: A book about using Node.js
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Heroku + Node.JS
item.description: Learn how to build and deploy Node.JS applications on Heroku.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: AngularJS in 60 Minutes
item.description: AngularJS Fundamentals in 60 Minutes is going to go through all of the key fundamentals you need to know about the AngularJS SPA framework.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: AngularJS Succinctly
item.description: Perform common tasks and overcome common problems in Angular.js.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Node.js Succinctly
item.description: Learn the basics of Node.js: non-blocking I/O, the event loop, modules, and the Node.js runtime environment. From there, dive into building practical solutions that interact with filesystems and streams, access databases, handle web server message queuing, and more.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Mastering Node.js
item.description: Open Source Node eBook
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Mastering Bitcoin
item.description: Mastering Bitcoin is essential reading for everyone interested in learning about bitcoin basics, the technical operation of bitcoin, or if you're building the next great bitcoin killer app or business.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Learn Ruby On Rails
item.description: Called 'the best book for beginners'
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Git Internals
item.description: This PDF explains the internal workings of the Git source code control system. It was originally written by Scott Chacon and published at PeepCode (now a part of Pluralsight).
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira

item.title: Book: Dive Into Python
item.description: Python from novice to pro.
item.dc:creator: Caio Ribeiro Pereira
